name: Leopard-iOS
summary: iOS SDK for Picovoice's Leopard speech-to-text engine.
description:
Leopard is an on-device speech-to-text engine.

Leopard is:
  - private, all voice processing runs locally.
  - Accurate
  - compact and computationally-Efficient
  - cross-platform:
    - Linux (x86_64)
    - macOS (x86_64, arm64)
    - Windows (x86_64)
    - Android
    - iOS
    - Raspberry Pi (4, 3)
    - NVIDIA Jetson Nano
